DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Marketed One-Step Peroxide Lens Care Solution Symptomatic Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Current biweekly monthly silicone hydrogel contact lens wearer ( exclude Air Optix® brand ) wear lens bilaterally least three ( 3 ) month prior Visit 1 ( daily wear use ) . Symptoms contact lens discomfort define protocol . Habitual use biguanidepreserved multipurpose solution least 30 day prior Visit 1 .
